SELECT to_char(purchase_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS stat_date, SUM(purchase_price) AS total_price, SUM(purchase_count) AS total_count FROM purchase WHERE tran_code = '1' AND purchase_price >= 0
GROUP BY to_char(purchase_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY 1

SELECT vt.purchase_date AS stat_date, vt.purchase_price AS total_price, vt.purchase_count AS total_count FROM ( SELECT to_char(purchase_date, 'yyyy-mm') AS purchase_date, SUM(purchase_price) AS purchase_price, SUM(purchase_count) AS purchase_count FROM purchase WHERE to_char(purchase_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') GROUP BY to_char(purchase_date, 'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY purchase_date ) vt

SELECT TO_CHAR(purchase_date, 'q') AS stat_date, SUM(purchase_price) AS total_price, SUM(purchase_count) AS total_count FROM purchase WHERE to_char(purchase_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(purchase_date, 'q') ORDER BY stat_date
